snippet: The relative sales trends of different types of restaurants provide an indication of the health of the economy. When Americans feel better about their finances, they are more likely to eat at restaurants with full service, including bringing the food...
lead_paragraph: The relative sales trends of different types of restaurants provide an indication of the health of the economy. When Americans feel better about their finances, they are more likely to eat at restaurants with full service, including bringing the food to the table, rather than at restaurants with limited service. At the moment, both the restaurant sales and the falling unemployment rate indicate the economy is doing better than the Gross Domestic Product figures would seem to show.
